document_data.name: Delmuth Echorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Delmuth Echorn''' was the young [[elf|elven]] heir of [[House Echorn]] in [[Cormanthyr]] at the time that [[Elminster Aumar]] was nominated [[Armathor]].
document_data.Possessions: Delmuth Echorn an ''[[Avarphyn]]'', protective devices favored by the houses of [[Myth Drannor]]. It included such magics as ''[[feather fall]]'', ''[[fly]]'', ''[[free action]]'', ''[[ironguard]]'', ''[[knock]]'', ''[[neutralize poison]]'', ''[[spider climb]]'', and ''[[water walk]]''.{{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|92-93}}
document_data.History: Delmuth was the heir of the Echorn, one of the most noble of elven houses. When he found that a [[human]] had been nominated as armathor in [[241 DR]], he decided to quickly slay him. However, Elminster proved a very formidable opponent and in the end it was Elminster that killed Delmuth.
